EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}}, How Do We Control?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, Demand and supply, a simple model that has allowed the United States to scale out and become the world power that it is today. Now VMTurbo is bringing this simple idea to the datacenter in the form of demand-driven control...How you may ask? Well my friend, its time to find out <http://vmturbo.com/blog/vmturbo-provide-control?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=whiteboard_vid&utm_content=02_16_15>. How Does VMTurbo Provide Control?
<http://vmturbo.com/blog/vmturbo-provide-control?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=whiteboard_vid&utm_content=02_16_15> Your IT control system, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
